text: John Richard Deacon (born 19 August 1951) is a retired English musician. He is best known as the bass guitarist of the rock band Queen. He lives in Putney in Southwest London with his wife Veronica Tetzlaff. They were married on 18 January 1975. He is the father of six children. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Bass guitarists Category:Musicians from Leicestershire Category:Queen (band) members
title: John Deacon
